title: When enter wrong password and trying to login endless spinner is shown instead of validation error
body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug
*Summary*: no validation error is shown when trying to login to app with wrong password.

#### Expected behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)

#### Actual behavior
can see that I entered wrong password
![wr_pass](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4557972/50161110-24ccb680-02db-11e9-85d2-be71d921abcd.png)

### Reproduction
endless spinner

- Open Status
- Try to login with wrong password

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: nightly 18/12/2018
* Operating System: all
* Video: http://take.ms/DgSsV

#### Logs

```
15:35:31.597 - W - [jsserver] - [status-im.data-store.realm.core:251] - failed checking db encryption with Error: Unable to open a realm at path '/Users/curikovatm/Library/Application Support/Status/default.realm/accounts/0x03b56231b5df31258eacbe280f5ce27ab9d743b2e79f01a62a8ef94dc305af28': Realm file decryption failed.
15:35:31.597 - I - [jsserver] - [status-im.data-store.realm.core:252] - try to encrypt with old key
15:35:31.598 - W - [jsserver] - [status-im.accounts.login.core:44] - Could not change account {:message "Error: Unable to open a realm at path '/Users/curikovatm/Library/Application Support/Status/default.realm/accounts/0x03b56231b5df31258eacbe280f5ce27ab9d743b2e79f01a62a8ef94dc305af28': Realm file decryption failed.", :error :decryption-failed}
15:35:31.599 - D - [jsserver] - [status-im.utils.handlers:34] - Handling re-frame event:  :init.callback/account-change-error
15:35:33.558 - D - [jsserver] - [status-im.utils.handlers:34] - Handling re-frame event:  :mailserver/check-connection-timeout

```
